question: Select the correct option denoting the proper sequence of sewage tratment.

choices.value: Filtration, Sedimentation, Aeration, Biological oxidation and UV radiation
Sedimentation, Filtration, Biological oxidation, Aeration and UV radiation.
Filtration, Aeration, Biological oxidation, Sedimentation and UV radiation.
UV radiation, Sedimentation, Filtration, Biological oxidation and Aeration.
